original_text: I would like someone to stop me breathing! Death would be better than life. I would like someone to stop me breathing!
korean_text: 이러므로 내 마음이 뼈를 깎는 고통을 겪느니 차라리 숨이 막히는 것과 죽는 것을 택하리이다

sentences.original_text: I would like someone to stop me breathing!
sentences.korean_translation: 내 숨을 멈추게 해줄 사람이 있었으면 좋겠다!

sentences.original_text: Death would be better than life.
I would like someone to stop me breathing!
sentences.korean_translation: 내 숨을 멈추게 해줄 사람이 있었으면 좋겠다!
